doc:
Andy Milligan https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Andy_Milligan 0 Andy Milligan (February 12, 1929 – June 3, 1991) was an American playwright, screenwriter, actor, and filmmaker, whose work includes 27 films made between 1965 and 1988. In spite of the fact that he directed a number of films that have become cult favorites with horror movie buffs, he died in abject poverty in 1991 from AIDS and was buried in an unmarked pauper's grave in Los Angeles, California. Andy_Milligan ( February_12_,_1929 – June_3_,_1991 ) was an_American_playwright , screenwriter , actor , and filmmaker , whose_work includes 27_films made between 1965_and_1988 . In spite of the_fact that he directed a_number of films that have_become cult_favorites with horror_movie_buffs , he died in abject_poverty in 1991 from AIDS and was_buried in an_unmarked_pauper 's_grave in Los_Angeles , California .
